description:
This course is about Instagram Marketing and how to get started with a well thought out strategy. This course is designed to help anyone interested in growing their Instagram following and also interested in driving traffic to their website/app. To understand this course clearly, you must know how to use Instagram and understand the basic terminology "Likes, comments, followers, etc". Also, you must have an establish Instagram account already in place and ready to promote.

This course is a series of on-screen recorded videos so that you can see and follow the special techniques I use to analyze an Influencer's profile. Learn how to manually collect data and create a compelling analytic spreadsheet on your influencers to further gauge an Influencer's Active User Engagement percentage.

This is a short course with a huge wealth of knowledge. You can start and finish this course within a couple of hours and get started on your Instagram Marketing right away with the list of Influencers included in the course.
title: Instagram Marketing: How to maximize your budget
